  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/1161</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/1161</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">L'Anna i el Martí han partit peres</string>
            <string language="en">Anne and Martin have fallen out</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anne und Martin haben herausgefallen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anne et Martin ont tombé</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Anne e Martin caíram para fora</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Anne e Martin hanno caduto da</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η Anne και Martin έχουν πέσει έξω</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Miniunitat didàctica (MUD) interactiva sobre les frases fetes en català i la seva utilització en la conversa. Conté una presentació informativa, activitats d'autoavaluació, pràctiques i un enllaç per saber-ne més. Les activitats es poden imprimir i consultar mitjançant el portal.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive mini teaching unit (MUD) on set phrases in Catalan and their use in conversation. It includes an introduction, self-assessment exercises, practice activities and a link for further information. The activities can be printed out and checked on the website.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">llengua catalana</string>
            <string language="en">Catalan language</string>
            <string language="es">lengua catalana</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">llengües modernes</string>
            <string language="en">modern languages</string>
            <string language="es">lenguas modernas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">sintaxi</string>
            <string language="en">syntax</string>
            <string language="es">sintaxis</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive unterrichtende Minimaßeinheit 
(SCHLAMM) auf Setphrasen im katalanische und in ihrem Gebrauch im 
Gespräch. Es schließt eine Einleitung, Selbstbewertung 
Übungen, Praxisaktivitäten und ein Link für weitere Informationen 
ein. Die Aktivitäten können auf die Web site ausgedruckt 
werden und überprüft werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mini unité d'enseignement interactive (BOUE) sur
des expressions de positionnement dans le catalan et leur utilisation 
dans la conversation. Elle inclut une introduction, des 
exercices de art de l'auto-portrait-assessment, des activités de pratique et un 
lien pour de plus amples informations. Les activités peuvent 
être imprimées et vérifiées le site Web.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unidade ensinando mini interativa (LAMA) em 
frases do jogo no catalan e no seu uso na conversação. Inclui 
uma introdução, exercícios do self-assessment, atividades da 
prática e uma ligação para uma informação mais adicional. 
As atividades podem printed-out e verificado no Web site.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mini unità d'istruzione interattiva (FANGO) 
sulle frasi dell'insieme nel catalan e nel loro uso nella 
conversazione. Include un'introduzione, le esercitazioni di 
valutazione di se stesso, le attività di pratica e un collegamento 
per ulteriori informazioni. Le attività possono essere stampate
e verificate il Web site.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογική μίνι μονάδα διδασκαλίας (ΛΑΣΠΗ) στις 
καθορισμένες φράσεις στα καταλανικά και χρήση τους στη συνομιλία.
Περιλαμβάνει μια εισαγωγή, τις ασκήσεις αυτοαξιολόγησης, τις
δραστηριότητες πρακτικής και μια σύνδεση για περισσότερες 
πληροφορίες. Οι δραστηριότητες μπορούν να εκτυπωθούν και να 
ελεγχθούν στον ιστοχώρο.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Katalanische Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">moderne Sprachen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Syntax</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Langage catalan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">langages modernes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">syntaxe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Língua catalan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">línguas modernas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sintaxe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lingua catalan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">linguaggi moderni</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sintassi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καταλανική γλώσσα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σύγχρονες γλώσσες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σύνταξη</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
